title: Making wearable medical devices more patient-friendly with Professor Esther Rodriguez-Villegas from Acurable
content: Welcome back to Found, where we get the stories behind the startups. This week, our old friend Darrell Etherington joins Becca Szkutak to talk with Professor Esther Rodriguez-Villegas from Acurable...

title: Revolutionizing Cancer Treatment: A Conversation with Dr. Sarah Chang from Oncogen
content: Join us this week on TechTalk as Michael Johnson sits down with Dr. Sarah Chang, the visionary behind Oncogen's groundbreaking cancer treatment technology...

title: Innovations in Vision Care: An Interview with Dr. Sophia Lee from VisioTech
content: Ella Carter sits down with Dr. Sophia Lee, co-founder of VisioTech, to explore the latest advancements in vision care technology and how they're improving eye health and sight for millions...

title: Empowering Patients Through Telemedicine: An Interview with Dr. Ava Patel from TeleHealth Solutions
content: Nora Adams sits down with Dr. Ava Patel, founder of TeleHealth Solutions, to explore the transformative power of telemedicine and how it's improving access to healthcare for patients worldwide...

title: The Future of Remote Monitoring: A Conversation with Dr. Daniel Wong from RemoteHealth
content: Join Isabella Nguyen as she discusses the future of remote monitoring with Dr. Daniel Wong, CEO of RemoteHealth, and explores how their platform is transforming healthcare delivery...

title: Revolutionizing Home Healthcare: A Conversation with Dr. Olivia White from HomeCareTech
content: Join Liam Taylor as he discusses the future of home healthcare with Dr. Olivia White, CEO of HomeCareTech, and explores how their innovative solutions are enabling patients to receive quality care in the comfort of their homes...

title: Revolutionizing Dermatology: A Discussion with Dr. Sophia Davis from DermTech
content: Ethan Harris explores the future of dermatology with Dr. Sophia Davis, CEO of DermTech, and discusses how their innovative technologies are revolutionizing skin health and diagnosis...

title: Advancements in Chronic Disease Management: An Interview with Dr. Benjamin Lewis from ChronicCareTech
content: Sophia King sits down with Dr. Benjamin Lewis, founder of ChronicCareTech, to explore the latest advancements in chronic disease management and how technology is improving outcomes for patients...

title: Transforming Sleep Medicine: A Conversation with Dr. Jacob Wilson from SleepWell
content: Ava Thompson explores the latest innovations in sleep medicine with Dr. Jacob Wilson, CEO of SleepWell, and discusses how their technology is helping people achieve better sleep and overall health...

title: The Future of Mental Health: Insights from Dr. James Smith of MindMeld
content: Dive deep into the world of mental health innovation with Emily Wu and Dr. James Smith, CEO of MindMeld, as they discuss the future of therapy and technology...

title: Unlocking the Potential of Gene Editing: A Conversation with Dr. Anna Chen from GeneX
content: Join Ethan Lee as he explores the frontier of gene editing with Dr. Anna Chen, founder of GeneX, and learn about the possibilities and ethical considerations of this groundbreaking technology...

title: Empowering Patients Through AI: A Discussion with Dr. David Garcia from MedAI
content: Explore the intersection of artificial intelligence and healthcare with Sophia Patel and Dr. David Garcia, CEO of MedAI, as they discuss how AI is revolutionizing patient care...

title: Transforming Diabetes Management: An Interview with Dr. Rachel Kim from GlucoTech
content: Join Jake Thompson as he delves into the innovative world of diabetes management technology with Dr. Rachel Kim, co-founder of GlucoTech, and discover how their solutions are changing lives...

title: Revolutionizing Rehabilitation: An Interview with Dr. Alex Thompson from RehabTech
content: Sophie Lewis sits down with Dr. Alex Thompson, founder of RehabTech, to discuss the future of rehabilitation technology and how it's changing the lives of patients recovering from injuries and surgeries...

title: Enhancing Surgical Precision: A Conversation with Dr. Ava Martinez from SurgiTech
content: Noah Wilson delves into the world of surgical technology with Dr. Ava Martinez, CEO of SurgiTech, and explores how their innovations are revolutionizing surgical procedures and improving patient outcomes...

title: The Future of Personalized Medicine: An Interview with Dr. Ethan Thompson from PersonalMed
content: Emma Roberts sits down with Dr. Ethan Thompson, founder of PersonalMed, to discuss the future of personalized medicine and how it's shaping the way we approach healthcare...

title: Pioneering Prosthetics: A Conversation with Dr. William Jackson from ProsthetiX
content: Maxwell Carter dives into the world of prosthetics with Dr. William Jackson, CEO of ProsthetiX, and explores how their advanced technologies are restoring mobility and independence for amputees...

title: Advancements in Drug Delivery: An Interview with Dr. Emily Johnson from NanoPharma
content: Jacob Davis sits down with Dr. Emily Johnson, founder of NanoPharma, to explore the latest advancements in drug delivery technology and how they're enhancing treatment efficacy and patient outcomes...

title: Advancing Cardiac Care: A Conversation with Dr. Michael Nguyen from CardiX
content: Explore the latest innovations in cardiac healthcare with Olivia Clark and Dr. Michael Nguyen, founder of CardiX, and learn how technology is revolutionizing the treatment of heart conditions...

title: Breaking Boundaries in Neurology: A Discussion with Dr. Emily Roberts from NeuroNex
content: Join Nathan Harris as he explores the latest breakthroughs in neurology with Dr. Emily Roberts, CEO of NeuroNex, and learn how their research is paving the way for new treatments and therapies...
